overview: "It's dawn. Precisely 5:26 in the morning, the 13th of February, 2014. We're just a few miles outside the compound of a group that refers to themselves as 'The Church of the Sidways Circle.' Their leader, a man who calls himself Hezekiah, has agreed to allow our crew to document him and his followers as they embark on a ritual of purification in preparation for an event that they are calling 'The End of the World.' An event which Hezekiah has predicted will occur at precisely 12:24 in the afternoon on February 14th of this year. For Hezekiah and his followers, the end is near."
title: The End is Near
